header.name: Ishita Sadaria
header.bio: Passionate Software Engineer with {{experience}} of experience in React, Angular, and Micro Frontend (MFE) architecture crafting scalable, high-performance applications. Exploring GenAI, Agentic AI, and emerging technologies to stay ahead in the ever-evolving tech landscape. Committed to creating seamless, impactful user experiences.
